data.name: Slime Girl Smoothies Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Nice club/louge beats to chill and vibe to from the game Slime Girl Smoothies

Tracklist:
1. Main Title
2. Berry
3. Cherry
4. Plum
5. Mint
6. Dialouge
7. Love Scene
8. Berry (Remix)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Music for Slime Girl Smoothies is written, created and composed by Adam Bryce Foley.

content_descriptors.notes:
Slime Girl Smoothies contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-The making and consumption of drinks labeled as alcoholic.
-Nudity (Full Frontal, suggesting and partial)
-Sex Scenes (Blowjobs, consensual sex, sex under the influence in a vanilla setting, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters.
-Non Consensual vanilla sex and sex under the influence of alcohol.
-One scene in the game is sexual asphyxiation viewer
discretion is advised.
-All characters in Slime Girl Smoothies are 18+ and over
